col","content":[{"$widgetId":"62.MyFirstModule.EmcureHome_Webpage.text2","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text2","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"We, at Emcure, believe in being a legally compliant and ethical Organisation. Good Corporate Governance is part of our DNA. Compliance for us is not an option but an integral part of our corporate culture. Legal Compliance Manager is an IT-enabled Legal Compliance Management System to monitor and ensure legal compliance of all Central, State and Local laws across the Company, it's Subsidiaries and all locations.\r\nEmcure expects every Employee to demonstrate his/her commitment in observing and complying with the various Laws, Rules and Regulations of the Country and help the Company in becoming a responsinble corporate citizen. I look forward to your using the system and ensuring that the Company is legally compliant at all times."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}]}},{"$widgetId":"62.MyFirstModule.EmcureHome_Webpage.layoutGrid10$row0$column1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg-3 col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"62.MyFirstModule.EmcureHome_Webpage.staticImage1","widget":"Image","props":{"class":"mx-name-staticImage1","alternativeText":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":""},"args":{}}},"responsive":true,"source":{"$type":"StaticImageProperty","image":{"uri":"img/MyFirstModule$Emcure_Imgc$Director_Image.png?638447403083241413"}},"onClick":null}}]}}]}}]}},{"$widgetId":"62.MyFirstModule.EmcureHome_Webpage.layoutGrid9","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid9 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid","content":[{"$widgetId":"62.MyFirstModule.EmcureHome_Webpage.layoutGrid9$row0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"62.MyFirstModule.EmcureHome_Webpage.layoutGrid9$row0$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"62.MyFirstModule.EmcureHome_Webpage.text4","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text4 spacing-inner-top-large","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"With best wishes,"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}},{"$widgetId":"62.MyFirstModule.EmcureHome_Webpage.text3","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text3 text-bold text-left d-block","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Satish Mehta\r\n"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}},{"$widgetId":"62.MyFirstModule.EmcureHome_Webpage.text5","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text5","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Managing Director & CEO"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}]}}]}}]}}],"ariaHidden":false}}]}}]}}]}}]}}]}}]}}],"ariaHidden":false}}],"selections":[]
